XML.STR: It has some rust here and there. Once used, it's sure to be difficult to sell.
It's a rusty sword. Once used, it's sure to be difficult to sell.
Heavy unique high-class dagger. Beautiful pattern inscribed on the surface.
Mysterious dagger, used to kill evil spirits. However, it could be an urban legend.
Unique dagger, used by Warlord's during the Storm civil war.
Basic iron dagger, made in a factory. A serial number is barely visible on the surface.
Low level iron sword. Faint serial number visible on the surface.
Great looking sword, used by ranked officers.
High-Class sword, made of rare materials for combat.
Mysterious sword used to kill a haunted evil spirit.
Gold plated attractive sword. Sword collectors desperately want to acquire this powerful katana.
(Dual Wield) These Kodachi Iron swords are widely produced for the general public.
(Dual Wield) Kodachi swords designed for two hands. Much lighter and smaller than regular swords.
(Dual Wield) This unique sword produced by Kodachi is made of high-end rare materials.
(Dual Wield) These powerful swords are a symbol of the Red Blood Dynasty, carried by a great swordsman in ancient times.
Sword used by the Hiru tribe.
Sword used by the Hiru tribe and added steel.
Sword used by dragon skin and fire ston.
Sword used by much steel and skeleton head.
This pistol has been used since a long time ago in the empire. Its production has been discontinued. Manufactured by Walcom.
(Dual Wield) These pistols have been used since a long time ago in the empire. Their production has been discontinued. Manufactured by Walcom.
It was developed to be supplied to the military. Its accuracy has been improved from the Raptor 80. Manufactured by Walcom.
(Dual Wield) It was developed to be supplied to the military. Its accuracy has been improved from the Raptor 80s. Manufactured by Walcom.
This legendary revolver was produced by Maxwell and supplied to the general infantry of the Republic. Its production is now discontinued.
(Dual Wield) These legendary revolvers were produced by Maxwell and supplied to the general infantry of the Republic. Its production is now discontinued.
This revolver was developed to supply the military. Manufactured by Walcom.
(Dual Wield) These revolvers were developed to supply the military. Manufactured by Walcom.

A revised model of the Raptor 50. Its performance slightly improved but the appearance has not changed from the old version. Its production was announced to be stopped quite early as its competition released a new product. Manufactured by Walcom.
(Dual Wield) Revised models of the Raptor 50. The performance improved slightly but the appearance has not changed from the old version. Manufactured by Walcom.
This pistol was produced to be supplied to the battlefront of the Republic. Manufactured by Maxwell.
(Dual Wield) These pistols were produced to be supplied to the battle front of the Republic. Manufactured by Maxwell.
The follow-up model of the Raven 5. It's performance has been improved but its manufacturer failed to make it lighter. Manufactured by Maxwell.
(Dual Wield) The follow-up models of the Raven 5. The performance has been improved but its manufacturer failed to make it lighter. Manufactured by Maxwell.
The follow-up model to the Raptor 120. It has more firepower, better performance and an excellent rate of fire.
(Dual Wield) The follow-up model to the Raptor 120. They have more firepower, better performance and an excellent rate of fire.
The Raven 7 has more firepower and a better rate of fire but it still has some drawbacks in terms of accuracy and weight.
(Dual Wield) The Raven 7s have more firepower and a better rate of fire but they still have some drawbacks in terms of accuracy and weight.
The Raptor series won confidence with it's high rate of fire and accuracy. This weapon shows the advanced development capability of Walcom.
(Dual Wield) The Raptor series won confidence with it's high rate of fire and accuracy. These weapons show the advanced development capability of Walcom.
The first of the lightweight revolvers from Canox. Though it's production has been discontinued, the second-hand Dynax is still a popular gun.
(Dual Wield) The first of the lightweight revolvers from Canox. Though their production has been discontinued, the second-hand Dynax is still a popular gun.
This model was produced in order to commemorate the fifth anniversary of Maxwell's Minic. It is more powerful than the original.
(Dual Wield) These were produced in order to commemorate the fifth aniversary of Maxwell's Minic. They have more firepower that the originals.
High-end revolver made by Nico. Its upgraded design draws a lot of attention.
(Dual Wield) High-end revolvers made by Nico. Its upgraded design draws a lot of attention.
Phantom Cruise's slightly upgraded model. Its performance has slightly improved.
(Dual Wield) Phantom Cruise's minor upgraded models. The performance has slightly improved.
Lightweight revolver made by Canox. This is the follow-up model of the Dynax 7000, its performance has remarkably improved.
(Dual Wield) Lightweight revolvers made by Canox. These are the follow-up models of the Dynax 7000, their performance have remarkably improved.
This is an upgraded model of the commemorative fifth anniversary Minic 567. It packs more power than the original one.
(Dual Wield) This is the upgraded models of the commemorative fifth anniversary Minic 567. They pack more power than the original ones.
The Zaurus Type B is the most powerful handgun money can buy. It also has better accuracy.
(Duel Wield) The Zaurus Type Bs are the most powerful handgun money can buy. They also have better accuracy.
This old submachine gun was produced by Canox. Its production has been discontinued.
(Dual Wield) These old submachine guns were produced by Canox. Its production has been discontinued.
This submachine gun produced by Walcom are quite popular. They have better firepower and a larger ammo capacity.
(Dual Wield) These submachine guns produced by Walcom are quite popular. They have better firepower and a larger ammo capacity.
Canox's small submachine gun. This was manufactured with a focus on better mobility.
(Dual Wield) Canox's small submachine guns. These were manufactured with focus on better mobility.
Follow-up model of the once widely-popular Renard. It has better accuracy and a higher rate of fire.
(Dual Wield) Follow-up model of the once widely popular Renards. They have better accuracy and a higher rate of fire.
The follow-up model of the Walcom S5. It has more firepower and better stability compared with its previous model.
(Dual Wield) The follow-up models of Walcom's S5. They have more firepower and better stability compared with its previous models.
New version of the popular Renard V produced by Canox.
(Dual Wield) New versions of the popular Renard V produced by Canox.
This model was produced in order to commemorate the 70th anniversary of Walcom. It has a lightweight body and it is called 'the Exterminator'.
(Dual Wield) These models were produced in order to commemorate the 70th anniversary of Walcom. It has a lightweight body and it is called 'the Exterminator'.
This new model was produced by Canox whose popularity was dented by Walcom XL.
(Dual Wield) These new models were produced by Canox whose popularity was dented by Walcom XL.
Upgrade to the Walcom XL. The only difference from the old model is enhanced fire power.
(Dual Wield) Upgrades to the Walcom XL. The only difference from the old models are enhanced fire power.
Pump action shotgun produced by Leonics, who has specialized in the production of shotguns for ages. Its production has been discontinued.
Pump action type shotgun produced by Leonics. Though made a long time ago, it is still very popular.
Leonics' new shotgun that was released quite recently.
Leonics's 7th model adopted a new design different from the existing Breaker series.
Shotgun introduced by Nico as a monumental product. This weapon has strong destructive power. It's only drawback, is it can only load a small number of bullets.
New shotgun produced by Leonics, who is quite famous for the Breaker series of shotguns.
Avenger's follow-up model that became the weapon of choice for adventurers.
Rifle produced by Nico in the early days.
One of the most popular rifles among the Republican army.
Produced by Walcom, it has the drawback of being difficult to use but it has relatively strong power.
Produced by Maxwell, this weapon has stable grip, good operability, and a high rate of fire.
Follow-up model of popular R5 of Nico. With its improved fire power, it is popular among R5 maniacs.
(Discontinued Item) Rifle with a higher fire rate than LX30. It has a stable grip with high accuracy.
Nico's new rifle with better fire power.
Still not easy to use but, this new product by Walcom is produced to focus on stronger fire power.
It is so heavy that it is hard to carry but, its rate of fire makes the enemies shiver in fear.
K9 machine gun with upgraded power. It's powerful rate of fire and damage will make swiss cheese of the opposition.
Nico's new machine gun with explosive power. Even just looking at the MG-KX will make the enemies feel pain.
Rocket launcher with strong fire power produced by Walcom.
Rocket launcher produced by Maxwell. It can hold more bullets than Walcom's L series and has a better fire rate capability. However, the fire power was reduced.
Walcom's Rocket Launcher. This slightly upgraded model of the L1 has slightly stronger fire power.
An upgraded version of RW-77. Though nothing major has changed, it has a better rate of fire than the previous models.
Walcom's Rocket Launcher. Holds more bullets than L1, it has become a little lighter and more powerful.
Rocket launcher made in the early days by Maxwell. It lacks the strong power.
Used by the military during the storm civil war. This is a typical sniper rifle with optimal level of accuracy.
Men's running shirt designed by Ares, a supplier of military outfits.
Very active men's cotton shirt designed by Renaut Sports.
Men's Leather Coat designed by Venico.
This winter jacket for men has good thermal insulation great for any cold environment.
Quite Fashionable and stylish men's trench coat produced by Miz.
Military jacket that Ares designed to supply the military.
Long wool coat designed by Vinz for men.
Men's shirt with flower patterns designed by Renaut for summer.
Cotton T-Shirt exclusively for women. This product is especially suitable for active women.
Urike Women's Leather Jacket quite popular with the elastic fabric.
Women's military vest, which ensures greater survival in combat.
Women's luxury coat designed by L-Star.
Women's military jacket supplied by Rex.
Women's stylish trench coat, a new design by Urike.
Women's flower patterned top for summer wear, designed by Bics.
Popular combat gloves, very comfortable simple design.
Winter gloves for men. designed by Vinz.
During combat these iron gloves provide excellent defensive power.
Gloves made of durable sheep leather.
Summer gloves for men, designed by Renaut.
Traditional design combat gloves, made out of elastic materials.
Women's iron gloves designed for aggressive combat.
Women's sheepskin leather gloves designed for combat.
Women's gloves for summer wear designed by Bics.
Men's trousers designed by Vinz, made out of elastic materials.
Sporty trousers designed by Renaut sportswear.
Miz trousers in a sophisticated design to enhance greater defense. Sleek and clean sewing on pure leather.
Trousers that Ares supplies to the military.
Men's swim trousers for summer designed by Renaut.
Flex women's training pants with excellent elasticity, good touch and feel.
(Discontinued Item) Women's Blue jeans widely worn by all, young and old.
Comfortable military trousers especially designed for female soldiers.
(Discontinued Item) Cotton trousers with luxurious touch that L-Star presents for special females.
Women's Blue jeans widely worn by all, young and old.
Women's Chamois trousers with a good touch and feel, designed by Vinz.
Cotton trousers (new) with luxurious touch that L-Star presents for special females.
Women's military trousers designed by Rex.
Stylish cotton trousers made by Urike. They have an added practical touch and stylish look, using coarse fabric.
Women's swimming shorts for summer designed by Bics.
High-end shoes with comfortable touch for dynamic activity.
Made with sturdy leather, these shoes do not tear no matter how tough the terrain is that they trod upon.
Heavy boots for greater defensive power during battle.
Very sturdy casual shoes designed by Vinz.
Men's sandals for summer designed by Renaut.
Urike leather shoes designed for combat.
Combat shoes specially made for female soldiers by Rex.
Heavy looking, however these shoes are made for those who put great value to their defensive power.
Leather boots with a unique touch and feel, designed by Urike.
Women's summer sandals, designed by Bics.
This ring was designed by the mayor in commemoration of his city and citizens.
This legendary ring was used by the special combat forces in ancient times.
This small ring preserves the wishes of many warriors who longed for a safe return home alive.
This ring holds the spirit of a brave commander who was killed in battle.
This unique ring was designed to commemorate the scientist who created a system named FMT. There is a faint McField signature inscribed inside of the band.
Simple designed ring for good fortune.
This ring was designed by the TEAMI in commemoration of Altema's war achievements.
A beautiful red jewel is the center piece for this energy based ring.

Elia's troops heroically protected Menlo, during the battle of Sun and raised the overall morale of Emperor Altema's soldiers. This ring was created to commemorate the princess' call of immortal courage.
This legendary ring enhances forces that help defy gravity.

Mysterious legendary armor produced by King Roku for the Pampoa's tribe. This coat enhances health and armor during battle.
Designed by Vinz. The flames give it an intense look.
Designed by Vinz. The fierce but passionate look is so impressive.
A rocket which was discovered from a Goblin King's dead body. The design is very unique.
A sword which was taken from the Giant Skeleton. It is extremely strong, but also cursed.
A silly looking hat which resembles a goblin's face. It does not have great defensive attributes, but it is fun to wear.
A silly looking hat which resembles a goblin's face. It does not have great defensive attributes, but it is fun to wear.
A glove with an unknown dark force. It feels a lot heavier than it looks.
A glove with an unknown dark force. It feels a lot heavier than it looks.
Odd Gun is a very strange gun which is made from various animals' bones and flesh. How the gun operates is still a mystery.
Wings of Catastrophe is a Kodachi that was modeled on wings and tail of Lich. It has been said that a part of Lich's body was used to create the weapon.
Defense of Leather Wrap Shoes was highly improved by the leather which is firmly wrapped around.
Defense of Leather Wrap Shoes was highly improved by the leather which is firmly wrapped around.

This unique item is Dark Lord's precious clothing which reveals her evil senses and identity.

A unknown foreign country developed this shotgun. It looks a little too light as a weapon, but the gun has great capability which comes from its light weight.

Just looks like Goblin! But it seems that it could be used for nothing.
